snippet: Republicans are attempting a manipulation of the legal system that would make a mockery of all that conservative legal scholars profess to believe.
abstract: Timothy Egan Op-Ed column scores Republican attempt to undermine Affordable Care Act in Supreme Court case King vs Burwell; holds move represents brazen manipulation of legal system; excoriates challengers for attempt to deprive millions of Americans of health insurance based on technical reading of law's language.
lead_paragraph: Republicans are attempting a manipulation of the legal system that would make a mockery of all that conservative legal scholars profess to believe.

headline.print_headline: The Plot to Kill Health Care
headline.main: The Plot to Kill Health Care

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
